name: Just Breathe
description:
Just Breathe is an interactive story, if you will. The story tells about feeling like things are not going your way, and how feeling lost in life can be a cycle.

Controls: WASD to move. Walk into objects to interact with them.

Dev Notes: This is my entry for the Bitsy Jam, with the theme "Ritual". After searching for many different engines, I wanted to try something more basic and one where I can tell a story while taking a break from programming. That is how I came across Bitsy! I wanted to tell a story that hits home at times, so I'm sorry if it is too personal. Don't worry, it is all going to be OK.
